appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Updated with a number of improvements
Fixed Google sign in issues, prevent crashes when no internet is available, and improved notification screens.
Fixed additional Google sign in problems.

creator: CatapultK12
descriptionHtml:
Never miss another emergency alert: The CatapultEMS app plays audible emergency alerts even when your phone is on silent. It works with WiFi or cell data.

Quick and easy: Add the icon to your home screen so you have quick access in an emergency.

No more passwords: Set up touch or face id, so you don’t have to worry about usernames, passwords and extra button presses.

---

This app works with CatapultEMS, a complete emergency management system for organizations and schools. Staff and student safety is our prime concern.

Use CatapultEMS to
• Gather locations of students, staff, and their statuses in an emergency.
• Have one-on-one emergency conversations.
• Alert districts, police, and fire.
• View up-to-date emergency procedures.
• Receive anonymous reports of threats.
If your organization does not use CatapultEMS, contact sales@catapultems.com for a quote.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improved UI for modifying app settings and viewing notifications, bug fixes for Google and Microsoft login, more descriptive login error messages, and a new app logs page to view detailed error information regarding failed logins.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This version contains a large number of fixes and improvements to app performance. Notable fixes include:

- Numerous fixes for Google and Microsoft log in errors and blank screens
- Fixed an issue where logging out may return the user to wrong log in screen
- Fixed an app crash when viewing App and Notification settings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our latest version of the EMS application includes the following improvements + fixes:

- Fallback Navigation: If you encounter an error, a new "fallback" menu will appear that allows you to return to the previous page, log the error or contact us for help
- More accessible error logs: A new button on the Settings page will bring you right to the most recent error logs generated by the app
- Better error/crash handling: We've improved a number of systems to help avoid app crashes

title:
Catapult EMS
2.1.0

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This latest build contains a number of fixes for crashes, bugs and on screen errors. In addition to these fixes, there are new setting options to control which alert tones are enabled.
